result.title: Pilot evaluation and impact assessment report
result.description: A report summarising the results of the pilot execution and providing directions for the refinement of the platform and the enabling methodologies. Two iterations of reporting are foreseen; one relatively early from the beginning of the continuous co-creation activities in order to quickly calibrate the platform; and one at the end of the project.
